description:
when i run "git review" for a bug,
log shows :
Problems encountered installing commit-msg hook
Permission denied (publickey).
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
and i'ver upload my ssh-key  id_rsa.pub to https://launchpad.net/~wangxh-smart

https://launchpad.net/~wangxh-smart
and my git config as:
root@ubuntu:/opt/stack/glance# git config --list
user.name=wangxiaohuastack
<email address hidden>
core.repositoryformatversion=0
core.filemode=true
core.bare=false
core.logallrefupdates=true
remote.origin.fetch=+refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*
remote.origin.url=git://git.openstack.org/openstack/glance.git
branch.master.remote=origin
branch.master.merge=refs/heads/master
remote.gerrit.url=ssh://<email address hidden>:29418/openstack/glance.git
remote.gerrit.fetch=+refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/gerrit/*
root@ubuntu:/opt/stack/glance# 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I want to know why.thanks for response as soon as possible.
title: when i run 'git review' for a bug,'Permission denied (publickey).'

comments.content:
when i run "git review" for a bug,
log shows :
Problems encountered installing commit-msg hook
Permission denied (publickey).
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
and i'ver upload my ssh-key  id_rsa.pub to https://launchpad.net/~wangxh-smart

https://launchpad.net/~wangxh-smart
and my git config as:
root@ubuntu:/opt/stack/glance# git config --list
user.name=wangxiaohuastack
<email address hidden>
core.repositoryformatversion=0
core.filemode=true
core.bare=false
core.logallrefupdates=true
remote.origin.fetch=+refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*
remote.origin.url=git://git.openstack.org/openstack/glance.git
branch.master.remote=origin
branch.master.merge=refs/heads/master
remote.gerrit.url=ssh://<email address hidden>:29418/openstack/glance.git
remote.gerrit.fetch=+refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/gerrit/*
root@ubuntu:/opt/stack/glance# 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I want to know why.thanks for response as soon as possible.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~wangxh-openstack

comments.content:
Hi, the documentation on how to setup your development environment is here -- https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/How_To_Contribute#If_you.27re_a_developer

Specifically, we don't use ssh keys from launchpad any more, you need to upload it into review.openstack.org.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mikal

comments.content:
Hi:

as i follow your suggestion .and then i run the command as beblow:

root@ubuntu:/opt/stack/glance# git review
remote: Processing changes: refs: 1, done    
To ssh://<email address hidden>:29418/openstack/glance.git
! [remote rejected] HEAD -> refs/for/master/master (no new changes)
error: failed to push some refs to 'ssh://<email address hidden>:29418/openstack/glance.git'
 
i want to confirm whether it's the right result while i run the git review first time
because of no any code changes for the openstack.
 
At last ,thanks for your help.





<email address hidden>

From: Michael Still
Date: 2014-02-12 06:15
To: wangxh.smart
Subject: [Bug 1278853] Re: when i run "git review" for a bug, "Permission denied (publickey)."
Hi, the documentation on how to setup your development environment is
here --
https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/How_To_Contribute#If_you.27re_a_developer

Specifically, we don't use ssh keys from launchpad any more, you need to
upload it into review.openstack.org.

** Changed in: nova
       Status: New => Invalid

-- 
You received this bug notification because you are subscribed to the bug
report.
https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/1278853
